name: D9: Add to cart, go to cart, proceed to checkout — validate page load

steps.name: Fill "Samsung mobile" getByRole('textbox', { name: /Search for products, brands and more/i })
Press "Enter" getByRole('textbox', { name: /Search for products, brands and more/i })
Query count locator('a[href*="/p/"]').filter({ hasText: /₹\s*[\d,]+/ }).filter({ hasNotText: /Currently unavailable|Price:\s*Not Available/i })
Click locator('a[href*="/p/"]').filter({ hasText: /₹\s*[\d,]+/ }).filter({ hasNotText: /Currently unavailable|Price:\s*Not Available/i }).first()

Wait for selector getByRole('button', { name: /Add to cart/i }).or(locator('button._2KpZ6l._2U9uOA._3v1-ww')).or(locator('button:has(svg.KRzcNw), a:has(svg.KRzcNw), [role="button"]:has(svg.KRzcNw)')).first()
Click getByRole('button', { name: /Add to cart/i }).or(locator('button._2KpZ6l._2U9uOA._3v1-ww')).or(locator('button:has(svg.KRzcNw), a:has(svg.KRzcNw), [role="button"]:has(svg.KRzcNw)')).first()
